snippet: A judge in Port-au-Prince accused nine people, including friends of former President Jean-Bertrand Aristide, of having had a hand in the killing of the radio journalist Jean Dominique.
abstract: Hatian Judge indicts nine people, including close associates of former President Jean-Bertrand Aristide, in political assassination of radio journalist Jean Dominique.
lead_paragraph: A judge in Port-au-Prince accused nine people, including friends of former President Jean-Bertrand Aristide, of having had a hand in the killing of the radio journalist Jean Dominique.

headline.main: 9 in Haiti Accused in Journalist Case
headline.print_headline: 9 in Haiti Accused in Journalist Case
